key.name: color-scheme
key.description: The color scheme to use: 'system', 'light', or 'dark'

key.name: restore-last-page
key.description: Whether to restore the last viewed page on startup instead of a fixed page

key.name: startup-page
key.description: The page to show on startup when restore-last-page is disabled. Valid values: 'about', 'aura', 'power', 'slash'

key.name: last-page
key.description: The last page the user was viewing (used when restore-last-page is enabled)

key.name: refresh-interval
key.description: How often to refresh data from the system, in seconds (0.1-10.0)
